name: streaming-enhanced
description: Automatically skip Ads, Intros, Recaps, Credits, etc. on Netflix, Prime video and Disney+ & Hotstar.

scripts.start-android: adb devices && web-ext run -t firefox-android --adb-device 38091FDJH002WH --firefox-apk org.mozilla.firefox
scripts.build: cd firefox && web-ext build  --overwrite-dest && cd ../chrome/ && web-ext build --overwrite-dest

author: Marvin Krebber
